replyText: Hi Surti. Thank you for reaching out to us. We apologise for this experience. One of the new swipe cards on the home feed had a bug that caused the app to crash. We have pushed out a fix. Please update the app to avoid any more crashes on the homescreen. Do reach out to us on bugs@scroll.in if you need anything. Have a great day.

title: Good at first. Now biased. No neutrality.
text: Good at first. Now biased. No neutrality. Scroll was a good alternative to the MSM who were hate spewing and cooking up stories. It covered almost every story in all parts of India. Now Scroll officially joins the MSM in their true character of exaggerating small incidents and making a controversy out of it. Scroll has officially succumbed to peer pressure and prejudiced reporters. No positivity. Poor research.  Uninstalled. I now keep track of news through twitter and not thru any irritating news channel apps.
Simply the best

title: Crash after update
text: Crash after update After the last update, the app is crashing after scrolling down. Great design though.
replyText: Hey Manish. We're glad you like the design. One of the new swipe cards on the home-feed had a bug that caused the app to crash while scrolling down. We pushed out an update to the Play Store yesterday that fixes this. Please update the app to avoid any more crashes on the home screen. Do reach out to us on bugs@scroll.in if you need anything.
